mapper.select: select g.gradename,c.classname,co.coursename,t.name teacher FROM clas_cour_teach AS cct INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON t.num = cct.teacherid INNER JOIN course AS co ON co.courseid = cct.courseid INNER JOIN grade g on g.gradeid = cct.gradeid INNER JOIN class c on c.classid = cct.classid WHERE g.gradeid = #{0} and c.classid = #{1}
